entry.title: WIND WARNING , Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 AM PST Sunday 03 January 2021

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Masset Municipal Airport 12:00 PM PST Sunday 03 January 2021
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 03 January 2021

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then rain. Wind south 30 km/h becoming southeast 50 to 70 this evening then increasing to 70 to 100 after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 03 January 2021
